basicInfo.description:
My name is: MentoskaPraha
I speak: English, French and Czech
My time zone is: GMT+2

A little bit more about me:

I'm an amateur programmer and average gamer. I almost always work on websites or API applications, but I do occasionally work on games not related to the web in any way. I like to play video games with my friends and we most commonly play game Sea of Thieves or Minecraft.

socialMedia.title: Github
socialMedia.description: My Github page. Here you can see all my repos.

socialMedia.title: Discord
socialMedia.description: If you want to contact me via Discord, join this server.

tech.title: VS-Codium
tech.description: VS-Codium is a fork of VS-Code, a program I use to write my code.

tech.title: Github
tech.description: Github is a source control tool used to share code.

tech.title: Node.js
tech.description: Node.js is a back-end runtime used to execute Javascript on a server.

tech.title: Typescript
tech.description: Typescript is a Javascript addon that adds type safety to Javascript.

tech.title: MongoDB
tech.description: MongoDB is a document based database used to store user data.

tech.title: Sveltekit
tech.description: Sveltekit is a web framework used for making websites.

tech.title: Tailwind CSS
tech.description: Tailwind CSS is a CSS utility for making website styling easier by adding pre-made CSS classes.

tech.title: Astro
tech.description: Astro is a web framework that can be used with other frameworks to make websites.

list.title: MP's Website
list.description: This website is my personal website. I use it to display the things I've worked on. The website is made using Astro and Svelte and is deployed using Github Pages.

list.title: Big Chungus Bot
list.description: Big Chungus Bot is a API application for Discord build with Discord.js, Typescript and MongoDB. He's a general purpose Discord bot that can give users custom colors, roll dice and much more. You can check him out on Github or try him out to find out more.

legal.privacy_policy: This website uses no cookie set by the creator. Your activity on this page is not monitored or tracked by the creator. The creator is not responsible for cookies managed by 3rd party services, such as Youtube, Github or others.
legal.copyright: This website was made by MentoskaPraha using VSCode, Github and other tools. All static image sources can be found in the README.md file on Github. This website is published under the MIT License.

quotes.content: Cold is just a state of mind.

quotes.content: Weak people revenge, Strong people forgive, Intelligent people ignore.

quotes.content: I'm not simping, I'm admiring art.
quotes.author: MentoskaPraha

quotes.content: It's better to suffer with friends.

quotes.content: I am ill... but you still work.
quotes.author: My G10 English Teacher
